page.title: 01Introduction
page.content: The area we have studied is situated in the{West of Scotland}approximately twelve miles from{Glasgow.}Our area is a rural one comprising a great deal of arable land,farms,small-holdings and small villages.Although linked to {Glasgow} by the{M8}motorway,areas of habitation are connected by winding roads lined with hedgerows.The small villages of{Kilbarchan,Brookfield and {Crosslee}which lie deep in the countryside provide ideal homes for people who commute to nearby{Glasgow.} Alternatively retired people who want to have a quiet life also stay in these villages.To the east of{ {Kilbarchan}are the small towns of{ {Linwood}and{Johnstone.}Both towns had factories but when they closed down many jobs were lost.Now the two towns, especially{Linwood}have a high level of unemployment.
